name: distance_between_airports
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool carbonsutra.
Tool description: Carbon Emission Estimations for Organizations.
API description: Calculates the distance between two airports given their IATA codes using the Toolbench API.

iata_airport_to.description: The IATA code of the destination airport.

iata_airport_from.description: The IATA code of the departure airport.
